definition: a mixture/an amalgam/fusion/welding together/to be in harmony with (nature)/to harmonize with/to fit in
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together

sentences.english: All patients were treated with anterior interbody fusion and internal fixation.
sentences.chinese: 所有患者爲前路植骨融合加內固定術。

sentences.english: The fusion body has many components.
sentences.chinese: 融合體有很多組成部分。

sentences.english: That may be the best wayto incorporate your hobby into your career.
sentences.chinese: 這可能是將你的興趣融合到工作中的最佳方式了。

sentences.english: But it's all mixed up together in a homogeneous, macroscopic fashion.
sentences.chinese: 但是它們在宏觀上，以均勻的方式融合了。

sentences.english: India's culture is marked by a high degree of syncretism and pluralism.
sentences.chinese: 印度文化以高度的融合性和多元性而著稱。

sentences.english: While the electrofusion method and results were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 同時討論了電融合方法和結果。

sentences.english: Retroflex suffixation in Chinese is a phenomenon of syllable merger.
sentences.chinese: 漢語兒化是一種音節融合現象。

sentences.english: in fact, building sucess is base on the binding of the two .
sentences.chinese: 事實上，成功的確建立在兩方面完全融合的基礎上。

sentences.english: The arrival of Princess Wen Cheng and promote Tibetan culture, the integration of clothing with the Central Plains.
sentences.chinese: 文成公主的到來，推動了藏族服飾同中原文化的融合。

sentences.english: A novel pixel-level image fusion scheme based on gradient pyramid decomposition is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了基於梯度塔形分解的像素級圖像融合新方法。

sentences.english: A dual-channel night vision color image fusion system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種雙通道夜視圖像的彩色融合系統。

sentences.english: Xenon lamp IR energy is ideal for flash fusing toner.
sentences.chinese: 氙燈紅外能量是理想的閃光融合碳粉。

sentences.english: Illustrated poetry is the artistic integration of Chinese poetry and painting .
sentences.chinese: 題畫詩，是中國詩歌與中國繪畫相互融合的藝術結晶。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a frequency direction-based multiresolution image fusion method.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種基於頻帶方向的多分辨率圖像融合方法。

sentences.english: All in-camera meters are reflected-light meters. Reflected-light meters are calibrated to show the appropriate exposure for "average" scenes.
sentences.chinese: 所有融合在照相機內的測光表都是反射式的。

sentences.english: It is a fusion of high-end acoustics and professional output power.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個高端和專業音響輸出功率融合。

definition: mix together/put together (usu. things that do not blend well together)
to blend into/to integrate/to assimilate/to merge
to form a cohesive whole/to fuse together
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
to create/to build/to develop/to forge (of metal)
